Uses of Interface
javax.tv.media.MediaSelectListener

Packages that use MediaSelectListener
javax.tv.media Provides controls and events for the management of real-time media in a television environment. 
 

Uses of MediaSelectListener in javax.tv.media
 

Methods in javax.tv.media with parameters of type MediaSelectListener
 void MediaSelectControl.addMediaSelectListener(MediaSelectListener listener)
          Subscribes the specified MediaSelectListener to receive events related to media selection on this Player.
 void MediaSelectControl.removeMediaSelectListener(MediaSelectListener listener)
          Unsubscribes the specified MediaSelectListener from receiving events related to media selection on this Player.
